title: Convert to Exponential Form
text: We know that we're trying to solve $$\ln(e^{4x})=4$$. Rewrite this expression first into exponential form.

title: Determing the Exponential Form
text: What is the exponential form of $$\ln(e^{4x})=4$$? Remember that the base for ln functions is e.

title: Solve for x
text: Since the bases are the same, we can solve $$e^4=e^{4x}$$ as $$4=4x$$. What is x?
